headline: Commitment 2022: Mike Gibbons campaigning for U.S. Senate
author: John London
sentences: When asked about Ohio's current governor, a fellow Republican who is taking a lot of political heat from the Republican right, Gibbons told us he voted for Mike DeWine and contributed to his campaign.
Just when you think you have it figured out, up pops a new poll showing roughly 25% of those who intend to vote on May 3 are undecided about which candidate they will vote for.
"You know, the things that they've done that are not so good that they're pointing out right now, I had nothing to do with," he said in reference to CRT advocates.
Although they all express confidence, businessman Mike Gibbons has reason to feel a lot better about his chances than he did just a few weeks ago.
Gibbons expressed a much different opinion about President Joe Biden, saying he "is taking the country down the tubes in very short order."
